Package com.islandpower.configurator.controller

Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.controller.ProjectController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/projects") public class ProjectController extends Object
Controller for managing projects. Provides endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting projects, as well as handling user-specific and step-completion operations.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      @PostMapping public Project createProject(@RequestBody Project project, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Creates a new project for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      project - The project details to create
      request - The HTTP request containing the JWT token
      Returns:
      Project The created project

    • deleteProject

      @DeleteMapping("/{projectId}") public void deleteProject(@PathVariable String projectId, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Deletes a project for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to delete
      request - The HTTP request containing the JWT token

    • getAllProjects

      @GetMapping public List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Retrieves all projects in the system.
      Returns:
      List of Project objects

    • getProjectsByUserId

      @GetMapping("/user-projects") public List<Project> getProjectsByUserId(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Retrieves all projects associated with the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTP request containing the JWT token
      Returns:
      List of Project objects associated with the user

    • getProjectById

      @GetMapping("/{projectId}") public Project getProjectById(@PathVariable String projectId, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Retrieves a specific project by ID for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to retrieve
      request - The HTTP request containing the JWT token
      Returns:
      Project The requested project

    • updateProject

      @PutMapping("/{projectId}") public Project updateProject(@PathVariable String projectId, @RequestBody Project project, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Updates a project for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to update
      project - The updated project details
      request - The HTTP request containing the JWT token
      Returns:
      Project The updated project

    • completeStep

      @PostMapping("/{projectId}/complete-step") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> completeStep(@PathVariable String projectId, @RequestParam int step)
      Marks a step as completed for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      step - The step number to mark as completed
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP OK status if successful
